uls-desc: Ko a toŋdaana kɔnɔɛ yaga ka o na baŋ iri kɔkɔre kyɛ maaleŋ paare kɔkɔre sɛɛtoo
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Kɔkɔre kyili la ko a wiki ŋa. Leɛ kaa fo [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] a paaŋ kyili kɔkɔre ko a wikis zaa.
uls-betafeature-desc: Wuli a kɔkɔre yoe ŋmaa zie lɛ, ka kɔkɔɛ na naŋ taa tɔna ko fo.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Sɛɛte kɔkɔre naŋ maŋ tonna ne Menu aneŋ sɛgere simmo
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Kyili a kɔkɔre Menus. A kɔkɔre poɔ yɛlɛ koŋ saambare.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] a baŋ iri kɔkɔ zaala ko a menus.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Daaloodi yiilone ka fooŋ wa boɔra
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Daaloodi a waaloŋ bɔrehi dayeni a kyɛ iri a waaloŋhi na naŋ taa sɔre.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Fɔnti ŋa ka a ko a tontona niŋe kaabo
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Fɔnti ŋa a ko poɔ yɛlɛ
ext-uls-input-settings-ui-language: Kɔkɔre ŋa ka ba maŋ de sɛgerɛ neŋ
ext-uls-back-to-input-settings: leɛ gaa a ŋme embo sɛɛtoore
ext-uls-ime-help: Lɛ na ka fo na baŋ toŋ neŋ
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: ŋme embo sɔɛ zaa kyɛbe ko a kɔkɔre ŋa.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-undo: Leɛ iri a toma na bare
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Fo baŋ eŋ la a ŋme embo tontonboma saŋa zaa ka fooŋ wa boɔra a yi a kɔkɔre sɛɛtooreŋ.
Fo baŋ eŋ la a ŋme embo tontonboma saŋa zaa ka fooŋ wa boɔra a yi a kɔkɔre sɛɛtooreŋ naŋ are peɛle a kɔkɔre yoe sɛŋ.
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Kɔkɔɛ zaa (ŋa ka fo daaŋ iri aneŋ noba mine zaa)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: De a [[$1|kɔkɔɛ yoe naŋ lantaa]], kɔkɔɛ naŋ taa tɔna ko fo.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: A gampɛle ŋa ba kye a kɔkɔre ŋa fo naŋ bɔ na poɔŋ.
ext-uls-setlang-error: Ɛɛrɔ da be la be saŋa na fo naŋ apudeetire fo kɔkɔ boɔraa. Ɛɛrɔ: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: A liŋki ŋa fo naŋ tuuro na boɔra ka a kaabo be a $1 ($2)
ext-uls-empty-state-header-actions-avail: Kɔkɔre zaa kyibe sɛne. Paare bompaalaa kaŋa.
ext-uls-empty-state-desc-actions-availab: Vɛŋ ka a poɔ yɛlɛ be kɔkɔ yaga poɔŋ.
